Introduction

Yu Jin is a South Korean singer and former member of the girl group Brave Girls.

She debuted with Brave Girls on April 8, 2011, with their first single album, The Difference.

On January 13, 2017, Brave Entertainment announced that Yu Jin would be leaving the group after six years to focus on her education.

On October 27, 2021, it was revealed that Yu Jin would be marrying her non-celebrity boyfriend, a dental graduate student in the United States. The couple, who met through a friend nine years earlier, maintained a long-distance relationship between Korea and the United States before planning to marry in July 2022.

Yu Jin is the sister of Haeri, a former member of P.O.P.
